results.title: Focal brain lactate accumulation in metformin-induced encephalopathy without systemic lactic acidosis: A case report suggesting mitochondrial vulnerability in lentiform fork sign
results.text_hl: ...@<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ causes @DISEASE_Brain_Diseases_Metabolic @DISEASE_MESH:D001928 @@@metabolic encephalopathy@@@ in some @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @DISEASE_Kidney_Failure_Chronic @DISEASE_MESH:D007676 @@@end-stage chronic kidney disease@@@, resulting in @DISEASE_Consciousness_Disorders @DISEASE_MESH:D003244 @@@impaired consciousness@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Parkinson_Disease_Secondary</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D010302 @@@parkinsonism@@@.

citations.NLM: Hanazono A, Takahashi Y, Sanpei Y, Kamada S, Sugawara M. results.title: Extrapyramidal syndromes of chronic kidney disease and dialysis (diabetic uremic syndrome) with reversible parkinsonism and lentiform fork sign: A case report and literature review including metformin-induced encephalopathy
results.text_hl: We report a case of a @SPECIES_9606 @@@patient@@@ on maintenance hemodialysis for @DISEASE_Diabetic_Nephropathies @DISEASE_MESH:D003928 @@@diabetic nephropathy@@@ who was taking @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ and developed subacute @<m>DISEASE_Parkinson_Disease_Secondary</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D010302 @@@parkinsonism@@@ and bilateral @DISEASE_Basal_Ganglia_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D001480 @@@basal ganglia lesions@@@ that rapidly improved after discontinuation of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ with continued maintenance hemodialysis.

citations.NLM: Sakurai T, Nishida H. Extrapyramidal syndromes of chronic kidney disease and dialysis (diabetic uremic syndrome) with reversible parkinsonism and lentiform fork sign: A case report and literature review including metformin-induced encephalopathy Heliyon. 2023 Mar;9(3):e14255. PMID: 36923829

results.title: Movement disorders related to antidiabetic medications: a real-world pharmacovigilance study.
results.text_hl: The combined therapeutic effects of multiple genetic variants of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@, especially @GENE_PRKAB1 @GENE_5564 @@@AMP-activated protein kinase@@@ (@GENE_PRKAB1 @GENE_5564 @@@AMPK@@@) were markedly linked to a greater likelihood of developing secondary @<m>DISEASE_Parkinson_Disease_Secondary</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D010302 @@@parkinsonism@@@ (OR:10.816, p = 0.049) according to MR analyses.

citations.NLM: Zhao Y, Fei L, Duan Y. Movement disorders related to antidiabetic medications: a real-world pharmacovigilance study. Prog Neuropsychopharmacol Biol Psychiatry. 2024 Aug 22;135():111128. PMID: 39181309

results.title: Importance of glucose and its metabolism in neurodegenerative disorder, as well as the combination of multiple therapeutic strategies targeting alpha-synuclein and neuroprotection in the treatment of Parkinson's disease.
results.text_hl: The current study focuses on treatment options for disorders associated with the @GENE_PGK1 @GENE_5230 @@@pgk-1@@@ enzyme, @GENE_GLP1R @GENE_2740 @@@GLP-1@@@, and @VARIANT_c.2A>A_GLP1R_human @VARIANT_tmVar:c|SUB|A|2|A;HGVS:c.2A>A;VariantGroup:0;CorrespondingGene:2740;CorrespondingSpecies:9606 @@@A2A@@@ receptor which can be utilized to treat @DISEASE_Parkinson_Disease @DISEASE_MESH:D010300 @@@PD@@@. A combination of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Terazosin @CHEMICAL_MESH:C041226 @@@terazosin@@@, @CHEMICAL_Exenatide @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077270 @@@exenatide@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Meclizine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008468 @@@meclizine@@@, @CHEMICAL_istradefylline @CHEMICAL_MESH:C111599 @@@istradefylline@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Albuterol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000420 @@@salbutamol@@@ treatments may benefit @<m>DISEASE_Parkinson_Disease_Secondary</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D010302 @@@parkinsonism@@@.

citations.NLM: Siddique AHH, Kale PP. Importance of glucose and its metabolism in neurodegenerative disorder, as well as the combination of multiple therapeutic strategies targeting alpha-synuclein and neuroprotection in the treatment of Parkinson's disease. Rev Neurol (Paris). 2023 Nov 30;():. PMID: 38040547

results.title: Metformin restores the mitochondrial membrane potentials in association with a reduction in TIMM23 and NDUFS3 in MPP+-induced neurotoxicity in SH-SY5Y cells
results.text_hl: These results suggest that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ pretreatment protects against MPP+-induced @DISEASE_Neurotoxicity_Syndromes @DISEASE_MESH:D020258 @@@neurotoxicity@@@, and offer insights into the potential role of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ in protecting against toxin-induced @<m>DISEASE_Parkinson_Disease_Secondary</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D010302 @@@parkinsonism@@@.

citations.NLM: Chanthammachat P, Dharmasaroja P. Metformin restores the mitochondrial membrane potentials in association with a reduction in TIMM23 and NDUFS3 in MPP+-induced neurotoxicity in SH-SY5Y cells EXCLI J. 2019;18():812-823. PMID: 31645842

results.title: Linezolid and Rasagiline - A culprit for serotonin syndrome
results.text_hl: She had a history of @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetes mellitus@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Parkinson_Disease_Secondary</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D010302 @@@parkinsonism@@@ on @CHEMICAL_carbidopa_levodopa_drug_combination @CHEMICAL_MESH:C009265 @@@levodopa/carbidopa@@@, @CHEMICAL_rasagiline @CHEMICAL_MESH:C031967 @@@rasagiline@@@, @CHEMICAL_ropinirole @CHEMICAL_MESH:C046649 @@@ropinirole@@@, @CHEMICAL_Trihexyphenidyl @CHEMICAL_MESH:D014282 @@@trihexyphenidyl@@@, @CHEMICAL_Amantadine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000547 @@@amantadine@@@, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@, and @CHEMICAL_Glipizide @CHEMICAL_MESH:D005913 @@@glipizide@@@.
